Package org.coniks.coniks_server

Provides the classes necessary to create a basic CONIKS server, as well as the classes this server uses maintain the publicly auditable key directory and to perform the CONIKS protocols with CONIKS clients.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ConiksServer
    Implements the main CONIKS server operations: interface to client, initiates Merkle tree rebuilding and signed tree root (STR) generation.
    DebugLogger
    Implements a logger used for debugging the CONIKS server.
    InteriorNode
    Represents an interior node in the CONIKS binary Merkle prefix tree.
    KeyOps
    Implements all operations involving encryption keys that a CONIKS server must perform.
    LeafNode
    Represents an generic leaf node in the CONIKS binary Merkle prefix tree.
    MsgHandlerLogger
    Implements a logger used for logging events related to handling messages received from or sent to a CONIKS client.
    PaddingLeafNode
    Represents an leaf node used for padding in the CONIKS binary Merkle prefix tree.
    RootNode
    Represents a root node in the CONIKS binary Merkle prefix tree.
    ServerConfig
    Sets various configuration parameters for a ConiksServer.
    ServerLogger
    Implements the main logger used for a CONIKS server.
    ServerOps
    Implements all operations done by a CONIKS server necessary for a CONIKS client to perform the consistency checks.
    ServerUtils
    Implements various utility functions used by various components of a CONIKS server.
    ServerUtils.PrefixComparator
    Comparator for ordering the pendingQueue in increasing order of a data binding lookup index's first 24 bits.
    ServerUtils.Record
    Represents a link in the hash chain of signed tree roots that forms the server's history.
    SignatureOps
    Implements all operations involving digital signatures that a CONIKS server must perform.
    TimerLogger
    Implements the epoch timer logger used for a CONIKS server.
    TreeNode
    Represents an generic tree node in the CONIKS binary Merkle prefix tree.
    UserLeafNode
    Represents a leaf node containing a user's data binding interior node in the CONIKS binary Merkle prefix tree.
    UserTreeBuilder
    Implements all operations necessary for building a CONIKS Merkle prefix tree on the server.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ServerUtils.RespType
    Defines the specific responses a server can present to a CONIKS client.

Package org.coniks.coniks_server Description

Provides the classes necessary to create a basic CONIKS server, as well as the classes this server uses maintain the publicly auditable key directory and to perform the CONIKS protocols with CONIKS clients.

This basic server supports new key registrations and key lookups. It is designed to communicate with the simple CONIKS test client.
